dcterms:creator: R. Gross
I. Matthews
J. Cohn
T. Kanade
S. Baker
dcterms:description: The CMU Multi-PIE dataset includes 750,000 images of 337 identities with variations in pose, illumination, and expression in a controlled environment. It contains images of 15 different views from 20 illuminations in different expressions.
dcterms:title: CMU Multi-PIE dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Sengupta
J.-C. Chen
C. Castillo
V. M. Patel
R. Chellappa
D. W. Jacobs
dcterms:description: The Celebrities in Frontal-Profile in the Wild (CFP) dataset includes facial images of 500 different identities with 10 frontal and 4 profile samples per identity.
dcterms:title: Celebrities in Frontal-Profile in the Wild (CFP) dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Whitelam
E. Taborsky
A. Blanton

J. A. Duncan
K. Allen
dcterms:description: The IJB-B dataset is a challenging dataset for face recognition in the wild, containing large pose variation and diversity in resolutions.
dcterms:title: IJB-B dataset

dcterms:creator: B. Maze
J. Adams
J. A. Duncan
N. Kalka
T. Miller
C. Otto
A. K. Jain
W. T. Niggel
J. Anderson
J. Cheney
dcterms:description: The IJB-C dataset is an extension of IJB-B, providing a challenging benchmark for face recognition with large pose variation and diversity in resolutions.
dcterms:title: IJB-C dataset

dcterms:creator: Q. Cao
L. Shen
W. Xie
O. M. Parkhi
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The VggFace2 dataset is designed for recognizing faces across different poses and ages, providing a large-scale dataset for face recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: VggFace2 dataset
